name: Healthy Gigs
description: Given a city name, the website will look up events over a span of time specified by the user and also provide the current COVID-19 statistics for the city. This project was a group project created for my coding bootcamp.

name: CodeHire
description: CodeHire is a coding employment website. In order to use it, users will need to create a profile and login credentials. In addition to their on-site profile, they are encouraged to also link to their Github and LinkedIn pages. If a user selects the employee option, they are given the option of posting jobs through the employer portal. They are also able to use a search page to find employees by skill set. Finally, users who are not employees are able to find and comment on job postings. This project was a group project created for my coding bootcamp.

name: Password Generator
description: A simple password generation app. The user is prompted for inputs on password length and character sets to draw from. Upon completion, a random password that fits the criteria will be generated.
